title: 98 Degrees in the shade, to hot in the shade
content:
This has nothing to do with making glyphs, but it might make making glyphs easier.

Make simple sugar for your ice tea/coffee and lemonade. One cup of sugar in a bowl add one cup of boiling water and stir with a spoon. The sugar desolves making simple surup. Simple surup desolves in your ice tea/coffee and lemonade, unlike raw sugar which goes to the bottom of your glass like a lump.

Lemons and Limes can be a pain to juice. Microwave them for 15 to 20 seconds then cut then into wedges, not across, you get more juice.

…summertime and the glyphs are easy…
author: Dan Weaver
